requirements.summary: Build a simple, educational, professional marketing website for Manthan Academy with English content and clear branding.
acceptanceCriteria: The site name “Manthan Academy” is prominently visible in the header and main hero section.
All user-facing text is in English.
The design feels educational and professional (no flashy animations required).

file_operations.description: Create the top-level app shell with site layout wrapper and route rendering for Home, About Teacher, Courses, and Contact (client-side navigation, no full reloads).

Create a consistent page layout that renders the header, main content container, and footer across all pages using shadcn-ui primitives for a professional baseline. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure metadata (title already set to “Manthan Academy”) remains aligned with the institute branding and English language usage.

requirements.summary: Implement and apply a coherent educational visual theme (warm neutral palette, typography, spacing, uniform components) across pages.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette and typography are used across the entire site (avoid blue/purple as the primary theme).
Components (buttons, cards, headings, sections) look uniform across pages.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add global theme tokens (CSS variables used by Tailwind/shadcn-ui), base typography, and spacing defaults using a warm neutral educational palette (non-blue/purple primary), ensuring consistent styling across the site. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Adjust/confirm Tailwind theme configuration supports the chosen warm neutral palette and readable typography scale consistently across components and pages (no blue/purple as primary).

Create a reusable Section wrapper for consistent page section spacing, headings, and responsive layout; compose with shadcn-ui Card/typography-friendly classes for uniformity. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a persistent header and footer with internal navigation links to Home, About Teacher, Courses, and Contact (highlight active state).
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation is visible on all pages and highlights the current page/state.
Footer appears on all pages and includes institute name and basic quick links.
All navigation links work without full page reload issues.

file_operations.description: Implement a top navigation header with logo + “Manthan Academy” brand and internal links (Home, About Teacher, Courses, Contact) using a React router link component and active-state styling; compose with shadcn-ui navigation/button components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a footer displayed on all pages containing the logo, institute name, and quick internal links; compose with shadcn-ui typography/link/button primitives. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire Header and Footer into the app layout so they appear on every page and navigation is handled client-side (no full reloads).

requirements.summary: Create a Home page with professional hero section, intro, offerings (CBSE support, Spoken English, English Grammar), and a primary CTA to Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a hero section with “Manthan Academy” and a short tagline/intro.
Home page lists the three main offerings: CBSE students, Spoken English, English Grammar.
A primary call-to-action leads users to the Contact section/page.

file_operations.description: Create the Home page with a hero (including institute name + tagline), a scannable offerings section listing CBSE Support, Spoken English, and English Grammar, and a prominent CTA linking to the Contact page; compose with shadcn-ui Button and Card components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register/wire the Home page route and ensure the Home navigation link maps correctly to it.

requirements.summary: Create an About Teacher page featuring Digvijay Karn’s profile, role, concise bio, and teaching focus areas.
acceptanceCriteria: The page includes the name “Digvijay Karn” and clearly identifies him as the teacher at Manthan Academy.
Bio content is concise, professional, and education-focused.
A section summarizes teaching focus areas (CBSE, Spoken English, English Grammar).

file_operations.description: Create the About Teacher page featuring “Digvijay Karn”, identifying him as the teacher at Manthan Academy, with a concise professional bio and a clear summary of focus areas (CBSE, Spoken English, English Grammar); compose with shadcn-ui Card and typography-friendly components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register/wire the About Teacher route and ensure header/footer navigation links target it correctly.

requirements.summary: Create a Courses page presenting the three course categories with brief descriptions and contact/enroll prompts.
acceptanceCriteria: Each course category appears as a distinct section/card with a short description.
Page is scannable and consistent with the site theme.
Each course section includes a clear prompt to contact/enroll (linking to Contact).

file_operations.description: Create the Courses page with three distinct cards/sections for CBSE Support, Spoken English, and English Grammar, each with short descriptions and a consistent “Contact/Enroll” link/button to the Contact page using shadcn-ui Card and Button components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register/wire the Courses route and ensure navigation highlights the active state on this page.

requirements.summary: Create a Contact page with editable placeholders for contact details and a basic contact form that works without third-party services.
acceptanceCriteria: The page includes contact details placeholders (Phone, Email, Address) that can be easily edited later.
A contact form is present with fields like Name, Phone/Email, Message.
Submitting the form provides a clear outcome without requiring third-party integrations (e.g., opens mail client via mailto or shows a confirmation message).

file_operations.description: Create the Contact page with editable placeholders (Phone, Email, Address) and a simple form (Name, Phone/Email, Message) that, on submit, provides an on-screen confirmation and optionally offers a mailto fallback; use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button components (compose only; do not modify ui components). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register/wire the Contact route and ensure all CTAs and nav links route to Contact without full page reload.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images as static assets and display them (logo in header/footer; hero image on Home/About).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
The logo is displayed in the header and footer.
The hero image is displayed on the Home page (and optionally reused on About) with proper responsive sizing and alt text.

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-academy-logo.dim_512x512.png for use in header/footer branding.
Add the generated hero illustration asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-hero-illustration.dim_1600x700.png for use on the Home page hero (and optionally About).

Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-academy-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header with appropriate alt text and responsive sizing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-academy-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer with appropriate alt text and consistent sizing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Display the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-hero-illustration.dim_1600x700.png within the Home hero section with responsive behavior and meaningful alt text. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Optionally reuse the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/manthan-hero-illustration.dim_1600x700.png (or a smaller variant presentation) to visually support the About Teacher page while keeping a professional layout and alt text. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
